subject: You have to send it through gi
body:
You have to send it through gift card or bitcoin,
Buy Steam wallet gift card or Apple gift card of $100 and send it to me through this email
 and i will obtain the document and send to you

subject: Re: You have to send it through gi
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I appreciate your prompt response. However, I must inform you that I am not comfortable with the proposed method of payment. It is unusual for official transactions to be conducted through gift cards or bitcoin. 

Could you please provide an alternative method of payment? Preferably a bank transfer or a secure online payment platform.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Shemika
